name: Project Breach
description:
"Project Breach" is a First Person Shooter Game where the player must use gadgets and play tactically to eliminate all the enemies


Game Features :

-Many Levels
-High action shooting in close combat
-Loadout system, many guns and classes to choose
-Leaning
-Rappelling
-Gadgets like breach charge and flashbangs
-Night vision and night mode
-4 difficulties with smart enemy AI
-Enemy traps to avoid
